channel.title: 鼠须管 on Blind with Science
channel.description: Recent content in 鼠须管 on Blind with Science

item.title: Mac 版 Emacs 中使用 Rime 输入法打带调双拼
item.description: 由于我习惯写中文博客，所以将写博客这件事也转移到 Emacs 后，我渐渐感觉到 pyim 的不足。所以今天研究一下如何让 pyim 调用 Rime 的词库。 https://manateelazycat.github.io/emacs/2019/07/24/use-rime-in-emacs.html 基础配置 首先安装鼠须管，

item.title: 鼠须管傻瓜化配置
item.description: This configuration: Optimized for simplified Chinese; Implement 朙月拼音 luna-pinyin, 微软双拼 double-pinyin-mspy and 地球拼音 terra-pinyin with 20+ dictionaries including symbols and emoji; Feature 地球双拼 terra-double-pinyin-mspy, a double pinyin input method supporting tone marks; Use 地球双拼 terra-double-pinyin-mspy to reverse lookup 吴语（苏州话）=wugniu_so
